long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Standing Church International is a Holy Ghost-Inspired church with a vision to raise a supernatural army through the teaching of Godâ€™s word and the release of the supernatural. 
We are committed to teaching men about all facets of the Christian life causing them to become matured and to experience the supernatural in all areas of their lives.
